titleStmt.title: This court considering the frequent and continued neglects of several of the principal officers of this city hereunder named, to perform their duty in attending upon and walking before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and Aldermen of this city ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Stamp, Thomas, Sir, 1628-1711.

notesStmt.note: Title from first four lines of text.
At head of title: Stamp mayor. Martis tricesimo die Augusti, 1692; annoque regni Regis & Reginæ, Willielmi & Mariæ, Angl', &c. quarto.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
